docs.snippet: The pitch that can extend a pitcher’s career is usually used by a handful of major league pitchers. But there are coaches and former knuckleballers who believe in it and work to get promising prospects to trust it....
docs.lead_paragraph: The pitch that can extend a pitcher’s career is usually used by a handful of major league pitchers. But there are coaches and former knuckleballers who believe in it and work to get promising prospects to trust it.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column discusses how few players know how to throw knuckleballs, and how mastering skill can extend older players' careers.

headline.main: As a Species, the Knuckleball Flutters but Survives
headline.print_headline: As a Species, the Knuckleball Flutters but Survives

docs.snippet: The agenda of the reformers, once a sweeping manifesto for change in the Islamic republic, has been reduced to simply calling for a high turnout in Friday’s balloting....
docs.lead_paragraph: The agenda of the reformers, once a sweeping manifesto for change in the Islamic republic, has been reduced to simply calling for a high turnout in Friday’s balloting.
docs.abstract: Members of Iran's reform movement, led by Mohammad Reza Aref, make humbler demands at political rallies for upcoming Parliament and clerical council elections; reformists, whose previous attempts to change status quo resulted in harsh clampdown, wants to reassure hard-line leadership they are working within system.

headline.main: Iran’s Thwarted Reformers Set Careful Goals for Coming Vote
headline.print_headline: Aiming for a Comeback, Iran’s Reform Advocates Set Small Election Goals
